body: Hello. Im just asking if it could be possible that you end this already. And with end it i dont mean to stop. In the contrary. You began with this over 3 months ago already. So please, finish your work! I am not saying that you should abandon RL for this bit still... there are other people like me who are waiting for more of your work. Keep it up with you own style and good quality of this. Your doing a great job. If just possible, speed it up for at least a little bit...
